name: PFC-PFI-BAIV Figma Make Templates
description: Reusable template specifications for Figma Make AI generation, optimized for BAIV design system token application and Claude MCP extraction

metadata.purpose: Generate consistent, token-compliant layouts in Figma Make
metadata.workflow: Figma Make → MCP extraction → Claude code generation

01_hero_section.name: Hero Section Template
01_hero_section.description: Full-width hero section with headline, subheadline, dual CTAs, and optional hero image/video

figmaMakePrompt.primary: Create a modern hero section with large headline, supporting text, and two CTA buttons. Use BAIV teal (#00A4BF) for primary CTA, BAIV orange (#E84E1C) for secondary CTA. Include placeholder for hero image on right side. Desktop: 1440px wide, 600px tall. Mobile: stack vertically.
figmaMakePrompt.detailed:
Design a conversion-focused hero section following these specifications:

LAYOUT:
- Container: 1440px max-width, 600px height
- Two-column grid: 60/40 split (content/image)
- Padding: 80px horizontal, 120px vertical
- Mobile: Single column, 40px padding

TYPOGRAPHY:
- H1: Titillium Web, 60px/68px, 700 weight, #171717
- Subheadline: Open Sans, 20px/32px, 400 weight, #525252
- Line length: max 600px

CTAs:
- Primary button: #00A4BF background, white text, 16px Open Sans 600
- Secondary button: transparent with #E84E1C border, #E84E1C text
- Button size: 48px height, 24px horizontal padding
- Gap between buttons: 16px

HERO IMAGE:
- Aspect ratio: 16:9
- Placeholder: gradient from #CCE8EE to #00A4BF
- Border radius: 12px

SPACING:
- H1 to subheadline: 24px
- Subheadline to CTAs: 32px
- Elements align left on desktop, center on mobile

mcpExtractionHints.componentDetection: Buttons should be auto-layout frames with text child
mcpExtractionHints.spacingUnits: Convert px values to spacing tokens (4px base unit)

claudeCodeGeneration.responsive: Mobile-first with md: and lg: breakpoints

02_feature_grid.name: Feature Grid Template
02_feature_grid.description: Three-column grid showcasing product features with icons, headlines, and descriptions

figmaMakePrompt.primary: Create a 3-column feature grid. Each feature has: icon (64px circle with #00A4BF background), headline (Titillium Web 24px), and description (Open Sans 16px). Desktop: 3 columns, Tablet: 2 columns, Mobile: 1 column. Include 6 features total.
figmaMakePrompt.detailed:
Design a features showcase section following these specifications:

SECTION LAYOUT:
- Section padding: 120px vertical, 80px horizontal
- Section header: Centered, with H2 and optional subheadline
- Grid below header: 48px gap

GRID STRUCTURE:
- Desktop (≥1024px): 3 columns, 32px gap
- Tablet (768-1023px): 2 columns, 24px gap
- Mobile (<768px): 1 column, 32px gap
- 6 feature cards total

FEATURE CARD:
- Layout: Icon → Headline → Description (vertical stack)
- Card padding: 32px
- Background: white (#FFFFFF)
- Border: 1px solid #E5E5E5
- Border radius: 12px
- Hover state: subtle shadow, border color #00A4BF

ICON:
- Size: 64px × 64px
- Background: #00A4BF
- Icon color: white
- Border radius: 50% (circle)
- Margin bottom: 24px

TYPOGRAPHY:
- Headline: Titillium Web, 24px/32px, 600 weight, #171717
- Description: Open Sans, 16px/28px, 400 weight, #525252
- Headline to description gap: 12px

SECTION HEADER:
- H2: Titillium Web, 48px/56px, 700 weight, #171717
- Subheadline: Open Sans, 18px/30px, 400 weight, #525252
- Header to grid gap: 64px

03_cta_banner.name: CTA Banner Template
03_cta_banner.description: Full-width call-to-action banner with headline, text, and prominent button

figmaMakePrompt.primary: Create a full-width CTA banner with gradient background (teal to dark teal). Center-aligned white text: headline (36px Titillium Web), supporting text (18px Open Sans), and orange CTA button. Desktop height: 400px.
figmaMakePrompt.detailed:
Design a conversion-focused CTA banner following these specifications:

BANNER LAYOUT:
- Width: 100% viewport width
- Height: 400px (desktop), 500px (mobile)
- Background: Linear gradient from #00A4BF to #005260 (135deg angle)
- Content: Centered vertically and horizontally
- Max content width: 800px

TYPOGRAPHY:
- Headline: Titillium Web, 36px/44px, 700 weight, #FFFFFF
- Supporting text: Open Sans, 18px/30px, 400 weight, rgba(255,255,255,0.9)

CTA BUTTON:

SPACING:

- Supporting text to button: 32px
- Side padding: 40px (mobile), 80px (tablet+)

ACCESSIBILITY:

04_testimonial_carousel.name: Testimonial Carousel Template
04_testimonial_carousel.description: Interactive carousel displaying customer testimonials with photos, quotes, and attribution

figmaMakePrompt.primary: Create a testimonial carousel with 3 visible cards. Each card: customer photo (80px circle), quote text (Open Sans 18px italic), customer name (Titillium Web 16px bold), and company/role. Desktop: 3 cards, Tablet: 2 cards, Mobile: 1 card. Include navigation arrows and dots.
figmaMakePrompt.detailed:
Design a testimonials carousel section following these specifications:

SECTION LAYOUT:
- Section padding: 120px vertical, 80px horizontal
- Background: #FAFAFA (neutral-50)
- Section header: Centered H2 above carousel
- Max width: 1440px

CAROUSEL CONTAINER:
- Desktop: 3 testimonial cards visible
- Tablet: 2 cards visible
- Mobile: 1 card visible
- Gap between cards: 24px
- Overflow: hidden with smooth scroll

TESTIMONIAL CARD:
- Background: #FFFFFF
- Padding: 40px
- Border: 1px solid #E5E5E5

05_pricing_table.description: Three-tier pricing comparison table with feature lists, highlighted recommended plan, and CTAs

SECTION LAYOUT:
- Section padding: 120px vertical, 80px horizontal
- Section header: Centered with H2, optional subheadline
- Pricing grid: 3 equal-width columns
- Desktop: side-by-side, Tablet: side-by-side, Mobile: stacked

PRICING CARD:

- Padding: 48px 32px
- Border: 1px solid #E5E5E5

- Box shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0,0,0,0.06)

RECOMMENDED CARD (middle):

06_blog_card_grid.description: Responsive grid of blog post cards with featured images, titles, excerpts, and metadata

- Section padding: 80px vertical, 80px horizontal

- Tablet (768-1023px): 2 columns, 24px gap

- Border radius: 12px 12px 0 0 (top corners only)

07_footer_comprehensive.name: Comprehensive Footer Template
07_footer_comprehensive.description: Multi-column site footer with navigation links, newsletter signup, social media icons, and legal links

figmaMakePrompt.primary: Create a comprehensive site footer with dark background (#262626). Top section: 4 columns (company info, navigation, resources, newsletter). Bottom section: copyright and legal links. Logo, social icons, and link lists included.
figmaMakePrompt.detailed:
Design a comprehensive site footer following these specifications:

FOOTER STRUCTURE:
- Background: #262626 (neutral-800)
- Two sections: Main content + Bottom bar
- Max width: 1440px, centered

MAIN FOOTER SECTION:
- Padding: 80px vertical, 80px horizontal
- Grid: 4 columns on desktop, 2 on tablet, 1 on mobile
- Column gap: 48px
- Responsive: stack columns on mobile with 40px gap

COLUMN 1: COMPANY INFO
- Logo: BAIV logo (white version), 140px width
- Tagline: Open Sans, 16px/28px, 400 weight, #A3A3A3
- Social icons: 40px × 40px, circular
  - Background: rgba(255,255,255,0.1)
  - Icon color: #FFFFFF
  - Hover: background #00A4BF
  - Gap: 12px between icons
  - Icons: LinkedIn, Twitter, GitHub, Email
- Spacing: Logo → Tagline (16px), Tagline → Icons (24px)

COLUMNS 2-3: NAVIGATION LINKS
- Column heading: Titillium Web, 16px/24px, 600 weight, #FFFFFF, uppercase
- Link list: Open Sans, 16px/28px, 400 weight, #A3A3A3
  - 5-7 links per column
  - Gap: 12px between links
  - Hover: color changes to #00A4BF, slight left indent (4px)
- Heading to links gap: 20px

COLUMN 4: NEWSLETTER SIGNUP
- Heading: Titillium Web, 16px/24px, 600 weight, #FFFFFF, uppercase
- Description: Open Sans, 14px/24px, 400 weight, #A3A3A3
- Email input:
  - Background: rgba(255,255,255,0.05)
  - Border: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1)
  - Border radius: 8px
  - Height: 48px
  - Padding: 12px 16px
  - Text: #FFFFFF
  - Placeholder: #737373
- Submit button:
  - Background: #00A4BF
  - Text: Open Sans, 14px, 600 weight, #FFFFFF
  - Height: 48px
  - Full width below input (8px gap)
  - Hover: background #008A9F

BOTTOM BAR:
- Background: #171717 (neutral-900)
- Padding: 24px vertical, 80px horizontal
- Border top: 1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1)
- Layout: horizontal flex, space between
- Mobile: stack vertically, center align

COPYRIGHT:
- Typography: Open Sans, 14px/20px, 400 weight, #737373
- Format: '© 2025 BAIV. All rights reserved.'

LEGAL LINKS:
- Typography: Open Sans, 14px/20px, 400 weight, #A3A3A3
- Links: Privacy Policy | Terms of Service | Cookie Policy
- Separator: ' | ' with 12px padding
- Hover: color #FFFFFF

08_contact_form.name: Contact Form Template
08_contact_form.description: Multi-field contact form with validation, textarea, and submit button

figmaMakePrompt.primary: Create a contact form with fields: Name, Email, Phone (optional), Subject dropdown, Message textarea, and Submit button. Use BAIV design tokens. Include field labels, placeholders, and validation states (error, success).
figmaMakePrompt.detailed:
Design a contact form following these specifications:

FORM CONTAINER:
- Max width: 600px
- Background: #FFFFFF
- Padding: 48px
- Border: 1px solid #E5E5E5
- Border radius: 16px
- Box shadow: 0 4px 16px rgba(0,0,0,0.08)

FORM HEADER:
- Heading: Titillium Web, 32px/40px, 700 weight, #171717
- Description: Open Sans, 16px/28px, 400 weight, #525252
- Heading to description gap: 12px
- Header to form gap: 32px

FORM FIELDS:
- Layout: vertical stack, 24px gap between fields
- Each field: Label + Input group

LABEL:
- Typography: Open Sans, 14px/20px, 600 weight, #171717
- Margin bottom: 8px
- Required indicator: red asterisk (#DC2626)

INPUT FIELDS (Text, Email, Phone):
- Height: 48px
- Padding: 12px 16px
- Background: #FFFFFF
- Border: 1px solid #D4D4D4
- Border radius: 8px
- Font: Open Sans, 16px, 400 weight, #171717
- Placeholder: #A3A3A3

STATES:
- Default: border #D4D4D4
- Focus: border #00A4BF, box-shadow 0 0 0 3px rgba(0,164,191,0.1)
- Error: border #DC2626, box-shadow 0 0 0 3px rgba(220,38,38,0.1)
- Success: border #10B981
- Disabled: background #F5F5F5, text #A3A3A3

SUBJECT DROPDOWN:
- Same styling as text inputs
- Chevron icon: 20px, #737373, right-aligned
- Options:
  - General Inquiry
  - Sales
  - Support
  - Partnership
  - Press/Media

MESSAGE TEXTAREA:
- Min height: 160px (6-7 lines)
- Resize: vertical only
- Same border/padding styling as inputs
- Font: Open Sans, 16px/28px, 400 weight

ERROR MESSAGE:
- Typography: Open Sans, 14px/20px, 400 weight, #DC2626
- Icon: alert circle, 16px, #DC2626
- Margin top: 8px
- Display: flex with icon left-aligned

SUCCESS MESSAGE:
- Typography: Open Sans, 14px/20px, 400 weight, #10B981
- Icon: check circle, 16px, #10B981
- Margin top: 8px

SUBMIT BUTTON:
- Background: #00A4BF
- Text: Open Sans, 16px, 600 weight, #FFFFFF
- Height: 56px
- Full width
- Border radius: 8px
- Margin top: 8px (32px from last field)
- Hover: background #008A9F
- Active: background #005260
- Disabled: background #D4D4D4, text #737373
- Loading state: spinner icon with 'Sending...' text

PRIVACY NOTE:
- Typography: Open Sans, 12px/20px, 400 weight, #737373
- Position: below submit button, 16px gap
- Link color: #00A4BF
- Example: 'By submitting, you agree to our Privacy Policy.'

primaryPrompts.purpose: Quick, actionable prompts for rapid Figma Make generation
primaryPrompts.when_to_use: Initial design generation or quick iterations

characteristics: Complete layout specifications with exact px values
All typographic details (font, size, weight, line-height)
All color specifications with HEX codes
detailedPrompts.when_to_use: Production-ready designs or when precision is critical

tokenReferences.purpose: Map generated designs back to BAIV design token system
tokenReferences.format: Object of token categories with dot-notation paths
tokenReferences.usage: Claude uses these to apply correct semantic tokens during code generation

extractionWorkflow: 1. Figma Make generates layout from prompt
2. User shares Figma URL with Claude
3. Claude uses MCP to extract design context
4. Claude maps Figma layers to component structure
5. Claude applies BAIV tokens based on extracted values
6. Claude generates React/Next.js code with shadcn/ui
mcpIntegration.layerNamingImportance: Consistent layer naming enables accurate component extraction. Use semantic names that match HTML elements (hero-section, cta-button, feature-card).
mcpIntegration.componentDetection: Auto-layout frames with specific naming patterns are automatically detected as reusable components.
mcpIntegration.colorMapping: MCP extracts HEX values, Claude maps to closest BAIV token (e.g., #00A4BF → brand.primary).

figmaMakeOptimization: Start with primary prompt for speed
Use detailed prompt if primary result needs refinement
Specify exact BAIV color HEX codes for accurate token mapping
Request proper layer naming in prompt for easier MCP extraction
claudeCodeGeneration: Always use Next.js 14+ App Router conventions
Default to Server Components unless interactivity required
Use shadcn/ui components where possible for consistency
Apply Tailwind utility classes following mobile-first approach
Include proper TypeScript types for all components
tokenApplication: Map all colors to BAIV design tokens (never hardcode HEX in final code)
Use spacing tokens (4px base unit) instead of arbitrary values
Apply typography tokens for consistent text styling
Reference radius tokens for border-radius values
Use shadow tokens for elevation consistency
